text: Tony Kaye (born 11 January 1945) is an English musician career whose career began in 1968. He is best known as the keyboard player of Yes. ==Discography== ===Yes=== ;Studio albums # Yes (1969) # Time and a Word (1970) # The Yes Album (1971) # 90125 (1983) # Big Generator (1987) # Union (1991) # Talk (1994) Category:1945 births Category:Living people Category:English rock musicians Category:British keyboardists Category:Musicians from Leicestershire Category:People from Leicester
title: Tony Kaye
